title: [High Plains, Plateau]
description: A steady, cold wind blows across the plain from the east, rustling in the damp grass and swirling tendrils of mist over the rolling ground.  A few solitary trees stand sentinel on the plain, their bare branches silhouetted against the distant sky.

A steady, cold wind blows across the plain from the east, rustling in the damp grass and swirling tendrils of mist over the rolling ground.  A few solitary trees stand sentinel on the plain, their bare branches silhouetted against the night sky.
